ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Status__c)), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Final"), OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Drop In"), ISBLANK(Fee__c), ISBLANK(Main_Venue__c )), Count_of_Estimated_Travel_Costs__c < 1, Count_of_Estimated_Venue_Costs__c < 1), NOT($Permission.Override_Course_Validation) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark a course as final requires a course fee, main venue and estimated travel & venue costs. Please ensure you've completed all of these.
